citations.narrative:
The records of animals on hand need to be updated with complete and accurate information on where animals originated
from, including the USDA license number of the seller. There is an additional hedgehog at the facility and a bushbaby on
loan that is also not on records. These records need to be maintained in an accurate and timely manner for recordkeeping
purposes.
Correct by: Jan 15, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The records of animals on hand need to be updated with complete and accurate information on where animals originated 
from, including the USDA license number of the seller. There is an additional hedgehog at the facility and a bushbaby on 
loan that is also not on records. These records need to be maintained in an accurate and timely manner for recordkeeping 
purposes. 
 
Correct by: Jan 15, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
